```{r}
lambda <- 0.2

simulations <- matrix(rexp(40000,lambda), ncol = 40)

averages <- rowMeans(simulations)

sample_mean <- mean(averages)
sample_sd <- sd(averages)

hist(rexp(1000,lambda))

hist(averages)
```
